diagrams.title: Gradient Descent
diagrams.description: Initialize Parameters → Calculate Gradient → Update Parameters → Check Convergence → Loop

diagrams.title: Adam Optimizer
diagrams.description: Gradient → First Moment (Momentum) → Second Moment → Bias Correction → Parameter Update

diagrams.title: Hyperparameter Tuning
diagrams.description: Define Search Space → Random/Grid Search → Train → Evaluate → Select Best → Repeat
